text: Hey
Hiya
are you familiar with Save the Children?
I'm not - Could you tell me more about it?
Well Save the children is an organization that ensures children rights to health education and safety. Children who suffer from hunger would greatly appreciate a donation
Great - So how does the donation process work? How do I make sure my money is being used for that purpose?
The research team will collect tall donations and send it to save the children
Ok - so can I donate $20?
Yes, your donation will be directly deducted from you task payment you can choose any amount from 0 to all of your paymen
oh - well since it'll be deducted from my task payment - Let's do half - $1
Half of 1 dollar?
Half the payment - One whole dollar
Alright thank you for contributing to Save the Children. Your donation will help children who cant afford help and are living through hell on earth.
Great, so do we keep talking for like 4 more turns?
Yes i believe we have a couple more turns left so I'll educate you more on where your donation is going.  Did you know 5.6 million children die every year do to preventable and treatable causes?
I knew it was a large number, which is one of the things I was thinking Save the Children could help with
Luckily for them, Save the children not only excels in health care but they also help children to a classroom education, protect them from abuse, neglect, and lastly provides emergency care.
Huh, that's awesome. Makes me feel even better about my donation
Do you usually donate to charities?
Yeah - I try to donate once a month or so
Alright, just to be sure you want to donate 1 dollar?
Yeah - That would be great. Thank you so much!
